title: SKYSTONE Game Field
description: FAMNM assembled a SKYSTONE game field for teams to view after the reveal.

title: Engineering Notebook Workshop
description: FAMNM Kickoff organizer Travis Gurlik gives teams tips on making their Engineering Notebooks the best they can be.

title: Game Reveal
description: Teams gather in Stamps Auditorium to watch the game reveal for SKYSTONE.

title: Pre-reveal workshops
description: Students listen to a pre-reveal workshop about how to improve their judging presentations for the competition season.
